content:
I’m a software engineer, amateur astronomer & cricketer.
On the internet, I’m f1rstmehul. I find coding in Go  really, really fun 1.
Distributed Systems and Compilers interest me the most.
apart from being close to monitor, I like to explore the cosmos and play(and watch) cricket.
I’m on, twitter, github and linkedin.
License All entries in this blog (posts and code snippets), are thus released under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0). I strongly believe that shared knowledge, in every field, is the only way to achieve real progress.
  Although I work with variety of languages or frameworks. ↩︎
